content.html: As a quick note on the Netlify Functions side, you can do them on-demand - for instance micropub-media-endpoint-proxy.netlify.app has a Netlify function that you can call arbitrarily - it may take a few seconds to spin up, but it works alright.
content.text: As a quick note on the Netlify Functions side, you can do them on-demand - for instance micropub-media-endpoint-proxy.netlify.app has a Netlify function that you can call arbitrarily - it may take a few seconds to spin up, but it works alright.
